mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content:
Built 2 Scale was founded with a singular mission: to provide business leaders, entrepreneurs, and tech enthusiasts with the knowledge they need to thrive in a rapidly evolving digital landscape. 

In each episode, we dive deep into the worlds of business strategy, cutting-edge technology, and artificial intelligence. We explore how these forces are reshaping industries and creating unprecedented opportunities for those who understand how to harness them.

Our conversations feature insights from industry pioneers, successful founders, and thought leaders who are at the forefront of innovation. Through these discussions, we aim to demystify complex concepts, share actionable strategies, and inspire our listeners to think bigger about what's possible. 

Whether you're scaling a startup, implementing AI in your enterprise, or simply fascinated by the rapid evolution of technology, Built 2 Scale delivers the knowledge you need to stay ahead of the curve. Join us as we explore the future of business and technologyâ€”for those who refuse to be left behind.

team.name: Matt Perrott
team.title: Software Engineer & Construction Tech Expert
team.bio: With a software engineering degree and extensive experience in construction technology, Matt brings a unique perspective to the show. His deep understanding of AI and its applications in traditional industries allows him to bridge the gap between cutting-edge technology and practical implementation for businesses looking to scale.

team.name: Scott Wilcox
team.title: Entrepreneur & AI Strategy Consultant
team.bio: Scott is a serial entrepreneur with multiple successful exits and a passion for AI-driven business transformation. As a consultant to Fortune 500 companies on AI strategy, he offers listeners practical insights on how to leverage emerging technologies to create sustainable competitive advantages and scale effectively.

topics.title: Business Strategy

topics.description: Emerging technologies and how they're reshaping industries and creating new opportunities.

topics.title: Leadership
topics.description: Building high-performing teams and developing the skills needed to lead in a digital age.

topics.title: Digital Transformation
topics.description: How traditional businesses can adapt and thrive in an increasingly digital economy.
